verbose_text: RNAi knockdown of ICL1e centrins in WT cells first causes a stripping of the ICL network (XREF_FIG A), then scattered disorders in the organisation of basal body rows, and cell growth arrest after a few divisions.
evidence: RNAi knockdown of ICL1e centrins in WT cells first causes a stripping of the ICL network ( XREF_FIG A), then scattered disorders in the organisation of basal body rows, and cell growth
